Name: Craftsman
Natural: The Craftsman V20 Cordless Hedge Trimmer features 22" dual-action blades, a 3/4" cut capacity, and Power Saw innovation for branches up to 1.5" thick. Lightweight and VERSATRACK™ compatible, it’s ideal for quick, controlled trimming around the yard.

Name: Poulan Pro
Natural: The Poulan Pro PR2322 gas hedge trimmer packs a 23cc 2-cycle engine and 22" dual-sided blades that cut limbs up to 1" thick. With anti-vibration tech and a rotating rear handle, it’s built for comfortable, high-power trimming.

Name: Snapper
Natural: The Snapper XD 82V Cordless Hedge Trimmer delivers 800W brushless power with 26" steel blades, rotating handle, and reverse function for jam clearing. Sold separately, the 2Ah/4Ah battery provides up to 90 minutes of reliable trimming performance.

Name: Husqvarna
Natural: The Husqvarna 122HD60 gas hedge trimmer features a long cutter bar, Smart Start® system, adjustable rear handle, and LowVib® tech. Lightweight and comfortable, it’s ideal for precision hedge shaping.

Name: DeWalt
Natural: The DeWalt 20V MAX Hedge Trimmer features 22" laser-cut blades, a high-output motor, and 3/4" cut capacity. Weighing just 7.5 lbs, it comes with a 5.0Ah battery and charger, perfect for clean, fast landscape trimming.

Name: Stihl
Natural: The STIHL HS 82 T is a pro-grade petrol hedge trimmer with a 2-MIX engine and dual-sided blades. Offering up to 5,100 strokes/min and ergonomic design, it’s made for precision vertical and horizontal trimming with reduced vibration.

Name: Ryobi
Natural: The Ryobi 22" 18V ONE+ Hedge Trimmer combines compact design with upgraded dual-action blades and 3/4" cut capacity. A rotating handle and Hedge Sweep debris cleaner make it ideal for precise, comfortable hedge maintenance.

Name: BlackDecker
Natural: The BLACK+DECKER 17" Electric Hedge Trimmer features dual-action blades, a 3.2 amp motor, and 5/8" cut capacity. Its lightweight build, T-handle, and full-length trigger offer control and comfort for trimming smaller hedges and shrubs.
